name: DODO FLY
description:
Thousands of downloads, thanks everyone for playing with DODO!!!
***HIGHLIGHTS***
-simple and casual “one button” game
-great skill unlock system, DODO can change himself by special skills
-beautiful art backgrounds make different cool world
-strong speed sense, especially when DODO is flying

A cute and happy dolphin toy – this is DODO. DODO is chasing real ocean and trying to become real dolphin. And it’s trying to jump and fly to escape the toy world. Watch out for the enemy toy and try to reach the destination. Sky is waiting for you, just fly!!!
